metadata.title: CVE-2021-35613 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Cluster product of Oracle MySQL (component:Cluster: General). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.26 andprior. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attackerwith network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Cluster.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of MySQL Cluster. CVSS3.1 Base Score 3.7 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.1 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
